nodes.id: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署

location.zh-cn: 广东省广州市荔湾区沙面大街53号
location.en: 53 Shamian Street, Liwan District, Guangzhou City, Guangdong Province

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署设立在广东省的派出机构，负责综合协调、协助管理、调查研究、监督审计巡视，并协调泛珠三角区域海关合作事务。
description.en: A dispatched agency of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China established in Guangdong Province, responsible for comprehensive coordination, management assistance, investigation and research, supervision, audit, and inspection, as well as coordinating customs cooperation affairs in the Pan-Pearl River Delta region.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国海关总署

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院下属的正部级直属机构，统一管理全国海关。
description.en: A minister-level institution directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China that manages all customs offices in the country.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署主任。
description.en: Director of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 受中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署管辖的正司局级海关。
description.en: A director-general level customs office under the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 受中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署管辖的正司局级海关。
description.en: A director-general level customs office under the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 受中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署管辖的正司局级海关。
description.en: A director-general level customs office under the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 受中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署管辖的正司局级海关。
description.en: A director-general level customs office under the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 受中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署管辖的正司局级海关。
description.en: A director-general level customs office under the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 受中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署管辖的正司局级海关。
description.en: A director-general level customs office under the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 受中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署管辖的正司局级海关。
description.en: A director-general level customs office under the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在促进中国泛珠三角区域内省区经济合作的机制。
description.en: A mechanism aimed at promoting economic cooperation among provinces and regions within China's Pan-Pearl River Delta region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院直接管理的机构分类，中华人民共和国海关总署是其成员之一。
description.en: A category of organizations directly administered by the State Council of the People's Republic of China, of which the General Administration of Customs is a member.

description.zh-cn: 中国的经济合作区域，包括广东、福建、江西、湖南、广西、海南、四川、贵州、云南九个省区以及香港、澳门两个特别行政区。
description.en: An economic cooperation region in China, including nine provinces/regions (Guangdong, Fujian, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Hainan, Sichuan, Guizhou, Yunnan) and the two Special Administrative Regions of Hong Kong and Macao.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署

description.zh-cn: 张格萍担任中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署主任。
description.en: Zhang Geping serves as the Director of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国海关总署

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署是中华人民共和国海关总署的派出机构，由海关总署进行业务和组织领导。
description.en: The Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs is a dispatched agency of the General Administration of Customs and is under its operational and organizational leadership.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国海关总署
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署成立于1980年，是海关总署设立的派出机构。
description.en: The Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs was established in 1980 as a dispatched agency set up by the General Administration of Customs.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署接受广东省人民政府的监督与指导。
description.en: The Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs is subject to the supervision and guidance of the Guangdong Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署

description.zh-cn: 广州海关在海关总署广东分署的管辖范围内。
description.en: Guangzhou Customs is within the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署

description.zh-cn: 深圳海关在海关总署广东分署的管辖范围内。
description.en: Shenzhen Customs is within the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs.

description.zh-cn: 拱北海关在海关总署广东分署的管辖范围内。
description.en: Gongbei Customs is within the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs.

description.zh-cn: 汕头海关在海关总署广东分署的管辖范围内。
description.en: Shantou Customs is within the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs.

description.zh-cn: 黄埔海关在海关总署广东分署的管辖范围内。
description.en: Huangpu Customs is within the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署

description.zh-cn: 江门海关在海关总署广东分署的管辖范围内。
description.en: Jiangmen Customs is within the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署

description.zh-cn: 湛江海关在海关总署广东分署的管辖范围内。
description.en: Zhanjiang Customs is within the jurisdiction of the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国海关总署

description.zh-cn: 2004年9月，海关总署授权其广东分署负责协调和处理泛珠三角区域的合作工作。
description.en: In September 2004, the General Administration of Customs authorized its Guangdong Branch to coordinate and handle cooperation work in the Pan-Pearl River Delta region.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国海关总署广东分署

description.zh-cn: 2005年2月，海关总署广东分署公布了《海关积极参与和推动泛珠三角区域合作的十项措施》，启动了合作机制。
description.en: In February 2005, the Guangdong Branch of the General Administration of Customs announced the 'Ten Measures for Customs to Actively Participate in and Promote Pan-Pearl River Delta Regional Cooperation,' launching the cooperation mechanism.

description.zh-cn: 香港海关对泛珠三角区域海关合作机制予以支持和参与。
description.en: Hong Kong Customs supported and participated in the Pan-Pearl River Delta regional customs cooperation mechanism.

description.zh-cn: 澳门海关对泛珠三角区域海关合作机制予以支持和参与。
description.en: Macao Customs supported and participated in the Pan-Pearl River Delta regional customs cooperation mechanism.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国海关总署

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，海关总署是国务院直属机构。
description.en: According to the infobox, the General Administration of Customs is an institution directly under the State Council.
